column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
For the cost-effective planning of the AWS infrastructure for the new social media application
column2: both the database and the application architecture were simplified to a single Availability Zone (AZ). This involved removing the additional web servers and application servers in the second AZ
column3: along with the read replica and database instance in the other AZ. These changes significantly reduce costs by minimizing the number of resources deployed while still maintaining the necessary services for 50
column5: thus balancing cost and performance effectively.
